DOC.HEADLINE: COMMUNITY NEWS : MANHATTAN BEACH ; MIRA COSTA FOOTBALL CHAMPS TO BE HONORED
DOC.TEXT: A parade honoring the Mira Costa High_School football_team , winners of a Southern Section football title in December , is scheduled for Saturday in downtown Manhattan Beach . Participants , including the football_players , the school band and the drill team , will meet near City_Hall on Valley Drive at 10 a.m. , school officials said . From there , they will march south on Valley Drive , then west on Manhattan Beach Boulevard to the Manhattan Beach Pier , where a half-hour awards ceremony is planned . The parade is sponsored by the city , the Manhattan Beach Chamber_of_Commerce and the Downtown Business and Professional Assn . Information : ( 310 ) 798-6460 .
